text: anal, ni etu parri arivu (ataram) perravanaka illaiyo atanai enakku inai vaikkumaru unnai avviruvarum varpuruttinal appotu ni avviruvarukkum valipata venatam; anal ivvulaka valkkaiyil avviruvarutanum alakiya muraiyil uravu vaittuk kol; (yavarrilum) ennaiye nokki nirporin valiyaiye ni pinparruvayaka - pinnar unkal (anaivarutaiya) milutalum ennitameyakum; ninkal enna ceytu kontiruntirkal enpatai (appotu) nan unkalukku arivippen
